title: Executive Order 9200-Amending Subdivision II of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 404), paragraph 3, Subdivision II of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended to read as follows:
3. Chief and Assistant Chief of the Foreign Service Buildings Office and Chief of the Office of Foreign Service Furnishings.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9200-Amending Subdivision II of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372308
